manipulations.insert_object: Insert a large pizza box on the top shelf, making sure it is partially obscured by other objects for realism.
manipulations.remove_object: Remove the metal shelving unit on the left side of the image, filling the space with matching floor tiles.
manipulations.replace_background: Replace the background seen through the open doorway with a view of a tropical beach at sunset.
manipulations.weather_time_change: Add heavy rain outside, with streaks visible on the window and a darker, overcast look.
manipulations.style_material_change: Change the wooden cabinets to have a glossy, modern white finish, reflecting light realistically.
